name: PublishCodeCoverageResults
description: Publish code coverage results to VSO/TFS
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: codeCoverageTool
inputs.label: Code Coverage Tool
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the tool with which summary files have been generated

inputs.name: summaryFileLocation
inputs.label: Summary File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of code coverage summary file. For example, $(Build.Repository.LocalPath)\jacoco\jacoco.xml

inputs.name: reportDirectory
inputs.label: Report Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of code coverage report directory. For example, $(Build.Repository.LocalPath)\jacoco

inputs.name: additionalCodeCoverageFiles
inputs.label: Additional files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular expression specifying the additional code coverage files to be attached to build. For example, $(Build.Repository.LocalPath)\**\*.exec
